CustomField.description: The Platform Score on Job level is used to calculate the Weighted Score on Job level and then the Actively Hiring Score on Account level. RO-2536
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Platform__c, "Stepstone") || INCLUDES(Platform__c, "Indeed") , 1, IF( NOT( INCLUDES(Platform__c, "HeyJobs") ) && NOT( INCLUDES(Platform__c, "Other") ) && NOT( ISBLANK( Platform__c) ) , 0.75, 0 ) ) * 0.15
CustomField.label: Platform Score
